name.en: The Central Bank and Financial Institutions

goal.en: This is a one-semester introductory course to the Central Bank and financial institution. This course introduces some important issues and fundamental concepts in the Central Bank and the financial market. Furthermore, this course will also provide some analytical tools and then apply them to various macroeconomic phenomena.
goal.ch: 中央銀行與金融機構是一學期的入門課程, 這個課程介紹關於中央銀行與金融市場的一些基本觀念與重要議題. 除此之外, 這門課也提供一些分析工具, 並且用來它解釋與分析各種的總體經濟現象.

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. An Economic Analysis of Financial Structure
3. Financial Crises in Advanced Economies
4. Financial Crises in Emerging Market Economies
5. Economic Analysis of Financial Regulation
6. Central Banks: A Global Perspective
7. The Money Supply Process, Review
8. Midterm Exam
9. Tools of Monetary Policy
10. The Conduct of Monetary policy: Strategy and Tactics
11. Quantity Theory, Inflation, and the Demand for Money
12. IS-LM Model
13. Aggregate Demand and Supply Analysis
14. Monetary Policy Theory
15. Review
16. Final Exam
